title: Cargo building issue: error: linking with `cc` failed: exit code: 1
body:
I am running cargo build --release in macOS 10.14.1 However, the following error keeps coming out after I tried almost all the solutions posted here. Could anyone help me out? Much appreciated.

```
eduroam-int-dhcp-97-243-246:tflgtfs pnc$ DEP_OPENSSL_INCLUDE=/usr/local/opt/openssl/include OPENSSL_INCLUDE_DIR=/usr/local/opt/openssl/include cargo build --release
   Compiling tflgtfs v0.1.0 (/Users/pnc/Documents/GitHub/tflgtfs)                                                             
warning: unused `#[macro_use]` import                                                                                         
 --> src/main.rs:8:1                                                                                                          
  |                                                                                                                           
8 | #[macro_use] extern crate log;                                                                                            
  | ^^^^^^^^^^^^                                                                                                              
  |                                                                                                                           
  = note: #[warn(unused_imports)] on by default                                                                               
                                                                                                                              
warning: unnecessary parentheses around function argument                                                                     
  --> /Users/pnc/Documents/GitHub/tflgtfs/target/release/build/tflgtfs-d95b4f3b251d6d86/out/main.rs:38:42                     
   |                                                                                                                          
38 |         let between = Range::new(0usize, (len - size));                                                                  
   |                                          ^^^^^^^^^^^^ help: remove these parentheses                                     
   |                                                                                                                          
   = note: #[warn(unused_parens)] on by default
```
